summary: An intellectual billionaire and two other men struggle to band together and survive after getting stranded in the Alaskan wilderness with a blood-thirsty Kodiak Bear hunting them down.
cast: Anthony Hopkins|Alec Baldwin|Elle Macpherson|Harold Perrineau|Bart the Bear|L.Q. Jones|Kathleen Wilhoite|David Lindstedt|Mark Kiely|Eli Gabay|Larry Musser|Brian Arnold|Bob Boyd|Kelsa Kinsly|Gordon Tootoosis|Randy Birch|Lawrence Lefebvre|Brian Steele
